publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1703 Iain Gray: The Draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2001—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
